#summary Installation guide
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

This page details how to install the Football Manager Roles software.

= Details =

== Step 1: Create the database ==
 # Use the download FootballManagerRoles.sql to create the database
 # Ensure it has collation utf8_general_ci
 # Name the database footballmanagerroles
 # Configure a user called fmrolesuser.
 # Ensure fmrolesuser has SELECT privilages only on the footballmanagerroles database
 # Create a strong password for fmrolesuser (change it from the default)

== Step 2: Configure JNDI ==
 # Add to tomcat\conf\context.xml the following 
{{{
<Resource name="jdbc/footballmanagerroles" auth="Container" 		type="javax.sql.DataSource" maxActive="100" maxIdle="30" maxWait="10000" username="fmrolesuser" password="1gNorance" driverClassName="com.mysql.jdbc.Driver" url="jdbc:mysql://localhost/footballmanagerroles" />
}}}
 # CHANGE THE PASSWORD to be the same as the one in the database

== Step 3: Upload the WAR ==
 # Place the FootballManagerRoles.war file in tomcat\webapps
 # Restart Tomcat
